articles.author: William Watts, Claudia Assis
articles.title: U.S. Steel shares surge after Trump backs partnership with Nippon Steel - MarketWatch
articles.description: President Trump's threat of 50% tariffs on European goods, starting June 1, were in focus ahead of the long U.S. holiday weekend. Trump also warned Apple that it faces a potential levy relating to its iPhone.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump on Friday came out in favor of a partnership between United States Steel Corp. and Japan's Nippon Steel.
"I am proud to announce that, after much consideration and negotiation… [+411 chars]
